sense.def:
Stony ground
so neravna tla, ki vsebujejo veliko kamenja.

seg.quote: ...a stony plain between low, barren hills.

sense.def:
Kadar je človekov izraz ali vedênje
stony
, ne kaže nobene ljubeznivosti ali sočutja.

seg.quote: She turned a stony face on Lucas.
The announcement was received in stony silence.
